fulltext:
Resume
To Hieu Trung
PERSON INFORMATION
Name: To Hieu Trung
Gender: Male
Nationality: Vietnamese
Email:  totrung@gmail.com
Tel: 0933016974
SUMMARY:
With over 10 years of experience in testing (video game, web app, win app, mobile 
app(android and ios), embed app testing) and programming knowledge (C++, .Net, Java, PHP, 
Python, Tcl, bash shell). I’ve experience in design test plan, test scenarios and test case, finding bug 
and report issue with high efficiency.
Having experience in setup the mobile network and testing many kind of games (Online, HD, 
Java, etc..) in many operating systems like Symbian, Android, iOS, WinMobile ...
Having experience in deploying automation script with Python, Tcl and bash shell, 
SeleniumIDE/Webdriver, webdriverIO, Appium, Detox. 
Having experience in performance testing with Jmeter tool(basic level).
Having experience in using bug tracking : Jira
Having experience to lead a small group.
Able to catch up new things and technologies are my strong points
Friendly, take responsibilities on work product and can work under high pressure environment
Expertise includes:

Video game/Social game/Online game 
testing knowledge

Experience in Web Application and 
Window Application Testing, embed 
software.

Knowledge of mobile operating systems

Knowledge of Linux OS foundation

C#/ Java / ASP.NET programming 
languages

Database designing.

Designing, developing and executing test
cases by manual.

Automation test tools

APIs testing

Software testing strategies/knowledge
Page: 1 of 7
Resume
CAREER HISTORY AND EXPERIENCE:
Jun.2018 – Now
Automation Engineering at ActiveMedia
Product  project 
    Join to apply and build automation framework


Build automation framework for web

Build automation framework for mobile app

WebdriverIO - js

Appium : java

Detox : js
Achievements: 

Gained experience in deploy automation tools

Gained experience in APIs testing
Apr.2017 – May.2018
Automation Engineering at SmartOSC
Ecommerce  project 
    Join multiple ecommerce project (based on SiteCore, Magento fw) as 
automation role
Responsibilities

Build automation framework for web and mobile app

Training and support member in team: new technologies…
Technologies used in project:
 Selenium
 Appium
Achievements: 



Gained experience in APIs testing

Resume
Oct.2016 – Apr.2017
Automation Engineering at Lampart
Product project 
    Apply and build automation framewrok using selenium webdriver 
(POM fw)
Responsibilities

Build automation framework

Training and support member in team: new technologies…

Gained experience in deploy automation tools


Aug.2013 – Oct.2016
Tester : Junior Engineering + Lead Engineering at Global CyberSoft
DirecTV 
    DirecTV provides television and audio services to subscribers 
through satellite transmissions. Services include the equivalent of many 
local television stations, broadcast television networks, subscription 
television services, satellite radio services, and private video services. 
Subscribers have access to hundreds of channels, so its competitors 
are cable television service and other satellite-based services
Responsibilities

Ensure that the software is run stable on devices

Maintains and deploy some manual automation tools that support 
task in team

Training and support member in team: new technologies…
Technologies used in project:

Basic Linux knowledge

Python Language

Tcl language

Bash script/shell
 Selenium
 Jmeter
Achievements: 

Gained experience in deploy automation tools

Gained experience in APIs testing

Gained experience about Linux

Get ISTQB Foundation Certification

Hand on in develop test plans, test cases and test scenarios

Improved skill of bug finding and reporting.

Gained experience about setup devices.
Page  3  of  7
Resume
Jan.2013 – Jun.2013
Tester : Senior Engineering at GameLoft
HEP Project 
This project ensures that all games can be installed and played on required 
platforms without any problem(no frame rate, video, music issues). The 
second purpose: all purchase in game (buy/transfer/sell item in game)must 
be recorded and give the customer the best seller item. 
Responsibilities

Ensure that games or applications complying with rules of each 
carrier

Ensure that the IAP (in-app-purchase) and IGP (in-game-
promotion) works correctly.
Technologies used in project:

Java games using J2ME 

Bug Data Base using Seagull PHP Framework.

 C++ for Java games

Object C for iOS
Achievements: 

Gained experience in analyze requirement

Hand on in develop test plans, test cases and test scenarios

Improved skill of bug finding and reporting.

Gained experience about setup devices.
Page  4  of  7
Resume
Jun 2011 – Dec 2012
Tester: Junior Engineering + Senior Engineering at GameLoft
Game 2D project
This project developed Java games which can run on all JAVA supported
devices brand names such as Samsung, Nokia, Sony-Ericsson, LG.
Games and applications are firstly developed to run on Sony-Ericsson
K800 devices, then port to all Java smart phones.
Responsibilities

Develop test plans, test cases and test scenarios

Execute test cases and catch bugs

Plan testing schedule for each build to meet deadline

Report status to team lead

Conduct training for new members

Support team members
Technologies used in project:

Java games using J2ME 

Bug Data Base using Seagull PHP Framework.

Unity Engine was using in all Facebook's Games
Achievements: 

Improved skills of leading and managing team

Improved skill of writing technical documents

Improved skill of communication with client

Had experience in team work

Promote to Senior in 2010
Page  5  of  7
Resume
Jan 2010 – May 2010
Tester : Junior Engineering at GameLoft
Window application
The purpose of this project to ensure the  new emulator tool (this 
tool uses to run game on computer which is no need to install in real 
device) supports all devices (mobile devices, tablets, computers ...)  
and the language which company supports
Responsibilities

Reading and analyzing documents, specifications

Design test case

Executing test cases

Fining bugs and reporting bugs to a bug tracking system
Technologies used in project
 Java.   C++
Achievements: 

Improved skills of leading and managing team

Improved skill of writing technical documents

Improved skill of communication with client

Had experience in team work

Improved knowledge of PHP language and database knowledge
Page  6  of  7
Resume
Nov 2008 – Dec 2009
Tester : Junior Engineering
Web applications.
This is an e-commerce site, the purpose of this site: provide the customer all
information about new release, tracking all transaction that customer had
purchased during using product. Ever after, the customer will know that
product which is recently download or have the best review on new product.
This site displays with too many language: English, French, Italy, Germany,
Turkey,... so must make sure all contents are translated correct and no
overlap/spill out issue
Responsibilities

Reading and analyzing documents, specifications

Design test case

Executing test cases

Fining bugs and reporting bugs to a bug tracking system
Technologies used in project

PHP. 

MS SQL Server 2005
Achievements: 

Improved skills of leading and managing team

Improved skill of writing technical documents

Improved skill of communication with client

Had experience in team work

Improved knowledge of PHP language and database knowledge
LANGUAGES:

Fluent in Vietnamese.

Good in reading/writing English
EDUCATION:
University/School:
Cao Thang Technical College
From: 2005
To: 2008
Qualifications: Good
Others :
+ 2015: ISTQB foundation level
